alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 18 at 2:10PM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches in the most persistent lake snows. The heaviest snow will shift south of Watertown, Fort Drum and Carthage by late afternoon, before diminishing by early evening. * WHERE...Jefferson and Lewis counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible in the lake effect snow band with deep snow cover on roads and very poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Travel along Interstate 81 will be severely impacted between Watertown and Pulaski.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
